resources.string: I don\'t have any symptoms anymore
A problem occurred. Please try again or restart the application
Something went wrong. Please sign out and open app again. Thank you!
You have met with a person with symptoms
You have not met with a person with symptoms
Please give the app permission to access your location
Please give the app permission to run in background
Your password is too weak. Try a password of minimum 8 characters with numbers or/and with uppercase and lowercase letters!
Email or phone number already registered
Check this app out. It's a covid-19 tracker.

It seems you have met a person with symptoms in the last 10 days. You should self-quarantine for 10 days. If you start developing any symptoms, contact your nearest doctor via phone and report it to the app by pressing the \"I have symptoms\" button. It is required that you report it to our application so that other users that will come into contact with you will be notified. If you would like to see the location and date of the meet-up press \"WHERE?\"
You have intersected with someone with symptopms!

Start tracking button - pressing the button opens up a window where you can select the maximum period during which the app will track you. Pressing the "OK" button starts recording your location. The app can run in background. Limit the number of other background running apps for a better performance. After pressing it, the button deactivates and the "Stop tracking" button activates. While recording, you can not use the "Test Path" and the "I have symptoms" buttons

 Stop tracking button - pressing the button saves the recorded locations on your device for 10 days. You will be able to see your path history in the "History" tab in the left drawer. After pressing it, the button deactivates and the "Start tracking" button activates

 Test Path button - pressing this button will verify your paths and tell you if you have met a person with symptoms. If you have met a person with symptoms, the app will provide a map with the meet-up locations highlighted with red markers

 I have symptoms - pressing the button will report to the server that you have symptoms. The database saves the paths of people that declared to have symptoms, without any connection to the person that actually pressed the button. After pressing the button it transforms into "I don't have any symptoms anymore" button.

 I don't have any symptoms anymore - pressing the button will report to the app that you no longer have any symptoms. After pressing the button it transforms into the "I have symptoms" button.

 Drawer - Pressing the lines in the top left corner or swiping from the left of the screen to the right opens a drawer that contains Map button, History button, Symptoms button, Tutorial button, Logout button, Share button

 Map button - it appears only while you are recording your path. Pressing this button opens a map that contains all the points registered by individuals with symptoms, from the last 5 days. 

 History button - pressing this button opens a list with all of the locally saved paths. Pressing on one item will open google maps with the start location of that path. The top-right button reveals a map with all of your start points marked

 Symptoms button - pressing this button will open up the official World Health Organization website showing symptoms and prevention methods for the virus.

 Tutorial button - pressing this button will open up this dialog.

 Logout button - pressing this button will log you out. You will need to reconnect to continue using our app.

 Share button - pressing this button allows you to share this app with your friends and family via the option you select

 Location button inside map - pressing this button re-position the map, with your location in the middle of the screen
Unauthorized request. Please logout and try again!
Location didn\'t work as expected! Please try again!
Invalid code. Try again or press on "Resend" button
There was an error when trying to send the email. Please try again!
The app does not have the required permissions. Please open the app and press the start tracking button
Email or phone number not valid
Email/Phone number not found. Try registering first!
